text: I'm trying to set up Mercurial repositories to be hosted by IIS under Windows Server 2003.
Following this post I installed Python 2.5.4.4 and Mercurial 1.3, set up virtual dir, extracted library.zip and created hgwebdir.config.
However, when I trying to open the http://hostname/hg/hgwebdir.cgi I got an error “The specified CGI application misbehaved by not returning a complete set of HTTP headers.” I did all by best:
One more thing is when I'm requesting inexistent script file (e.g /hg/inexist.cgi) I have the same error.
